titleInfo.title: Morris Hayutin Family at Balanced Rock, Colorado Springs

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: ''Morris Hayutin Family at Manitou Springs, c. 1914.''

mods.abstract: Morris and Anna (Ginsberg) Hayutin siting in the front seat in the car, Soloman Hayutin is the other man in the car, and Devera and Max Ginsberg sit on the back seat. The car is parked in front of the Balanced Rock in Garden of the Gods, Colorado Springs, Colorado. Morris Hayutin's niece, Freda Hayutin (child) is also seated in the car. Members of the Hayutin family arrived in Denver in the 1890s.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 98.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
